meanings.sent1: My nabes are friendly and always say hello.
meanings.sent2: I borrowed sugar from my nabes next door.
meanings.sent3: My nabes threw a block party last weekend.
meanings.sent4: The bond with my nabes is like having an extended family.
meanings.sent5: I can count on my nabes for help in times of need.

meanings.sent1: Our nabes have beautiful parks and playgrounds.
meanings.sent2: The shops in our nabes are within walking distance.
meanings.sent3: Exploring different nabes in the city is always fun.
meanings.sent4: The diversity in our nabes makes it a vibrant community.
meanings.sent5: I love the sense of community in our close-knit nabes.
